title: Amazing 2 bed 2 bath home
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Just Right” Living™ has arrived in Castro Valley!', 'The Brook on Center is a peaceful apartment community located in The Bay Area at the crossroads of San Francisco, Oakland and Silicon Valley, where the very best of Northern California is within reach!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 9, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Cats and Dogs 25lbs or less, max of two pets per household, restricted breeds, $500 deposit per pet, and $50 pet rent.', 'Deposit:', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Model Unit Pictures.', '(Pictures may defer from actual unit)', 'Application fee:', '$52.46', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'Shared', 'Parking type:', 'On-Street', 'Parking notes:', '1 Reserved Parking Space.', 'Please call us regarding our Parking Policy.', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven, Microwave in select units', 'Exterior:', 'Balcony/patio, Yards in select units', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Air conditioning in select units', 'Wiring:', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Shared pool, Playground, Barbecue', 'Security and Access:', 'Views:', 'Additional features:', 'Amazon Hub Package Service', 'Offered by:', 'The Brook on Center', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
